TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SystemColors extends System.Object

summary.span: 類別的每個屬性是 結構，這個結構為 Windows 顯示項目的色彩。

span.span: Each property of the class is a structure that is the color of a Windows display element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 藉由使用的屬性獲得更好的效能或是類別，而不是建立新的畫筆或筆刷根據從值。Better performance is achieved by using the properties of the or classes rather than creating a new pen or brush based on a value from . 比方說，如果您想要取得為 3d 項目的表面色彩的筆刷，使用屬性因為它會取得筆刷，已經存在，而呼叫建構函式的參數值會建立新的筆刷。For example, if you wanted to get a brush for the face color of a 3-D element, use the property because it gets a brush that already exists, whereas calling the constructor with a parameter value of will create a new brush. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範運算子和類別。The following code example demonstrates the operator and the class. 這個範例設計來搭配 Windows 表單，其中包含一個按鈕名為`Button1`。This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form that contains a button named `Button1`. 將下列程式碼貼到您的表單，並將產生關聯`Button1_Click`方法，按鈕之`Click`事件。Paste the following code into your form and associate the `Button1_Click` method with the button's `Click` event. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.CharacterRangeExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.CharacterRangeExample/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.CharacterRangeExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.CharacterRangeExample/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.CharacterRangeExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.CharacterRangeExample/VB/form1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ActiveBorder As Color
public: static property System::Drawing::Color ActiveBorder { System::Drawing::Color get(); };

summary.span: 取得 結構，這是使用中視窗框線的色彩。

span.span: Gets a structure that is the color of the active window's border.
A that is the color of the active window's border.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ActiveCaption As Color
public: static property System::Drawing::Color ActiveCaption { System::Drawing::Color get(); };

summary.span: 取得 結構，這個結構為使用中視窗標題列的背景色彩。

span.span: Gets a structure that is the color of the background of the active window's title bar.
A that is the color of the active window's title bar.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ActiveCaptionText As Color
public: static property System::Drawing::Color ActiveCaptionText { System::Drawing::Color get(); };

summary.span: 取得 結構，這是使用中視窗標題列的文字色彩。

span.span: Gets a structure that is the color of the text in the active window's title bar.

value.span: ，為現用視窗標題列中文字的色彩。

span.span: A that is the color of the text in the active window's title bar.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property AppWorkspace As Color
public: static property System::Drawing::Color AppWorkspace { System::Drawing::Color get(); };

summary.span: 取得 結構，這是應用程式工作區的色彩。

span.span: Gets a structure that is the color of the application workspace.
A that is the color of the application workspace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式工作區是多重文件檢視中沒有被文件佔領的區域。The application workspace is the area in a multiple-document view that is not being occupied by documents.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ButtonFace As Color
public: static property System::Drawing::Color ButtonFace { System::Drawing::Color get(); };

summary.span: 取得 結構，這個結構為 3D 項目的表面色彩。

span.span: Gets a structure that is the face color of a 3-D element.
A that is the face color of a 3-D element.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ButtonHighlight As Color
public: static property System::Drawing::Color ButtonHighlight { System::Drawing::Color get(); };

summary.span: 取得 結構，這個結構為 3D 項目的反白色彩。

span.span: Gets a structure that is the highlight color of a 3-D element.

value.span: ，為 3D 項目的反白顯示色彩。

span.span: A that is the highlight color of a 3-D element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個色彩會套用至面對光源的 3D 項目部分。This color is applied to parts of a 3-D element that face the light source.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ButtonShadow As Color
public: static property System::Drawing::Color ButtonShadow { System::Drawing::Color get(); };

summary.span: 取得 結構，這個結構為 3D 項目的陰影色彩。

span.span: Gets a structure that is the shadow color of a 3-D element.
A that is the shadow color of a 3-D element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個色彩會套用至背對光源的 3D 項目部分。This color is applied to parts of a 3-D element that face away from the light source.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Control As Color
public: static property System::Drawing::Color Control { System::Drawing::Color get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得 結構，這個結構為 3D 項目的表面色彩。

A that is the shadow color of a 3-D element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個色彩會套用至背對光源的 3D 項目部分。This color is applied to parts of a 3-D element that face away from the light source.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ControlDarkDark As Color
public: static property System::Drawing::Color ControlDarkDark { System::Drawing::Color get(); };

summary.span: 取得 結構，這個結構為 3D 項目的深色陰影色彩。

span.span: Gets a structure that is the dark shadow color of a 3-D element.

value.span: ，為 3D 項目的深色陰影色彩。

span.span: A that is the dark shadow color of a 3-D element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個色彩會套用至色彩最深的 3d 項目部分。This color is applied to the parts of a 3-D element that are the darkest color.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ControlLight As Color
public: static property System::Drawing::Color ControlLight { System::Drawing::Color get(); };

A that is the light color of a 3-D element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個色彩會套用至面對光源的 3D 項目部分。This color is applied to parts of a 3-D element that face the light source.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ControlLightLight As Color
public: static property System::Drawing::Color ControlLightLight { System::Drawing::Color get(); };

summary.span: 取得 結構，這個結構為 3D 項目的反白色彩。

span.span: Gets a structure that is the highlight color of a 3-D element.

value.span: ，為 3D 項目的反白顯示色彩。

span.span: A that is the highlight color of a 3-D element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個色彩會套用至色彩最亮的 3d 項目部分。This color is applied to the parts of a 3-D element that are the lightest color.

public: static property System::Drawing::Color ControlText { System::Drawing::Color get(); };

span.span: Gets a structure that is the color of the desktop.
A that is the color of the desktop.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property GradientActiveCaption As Color
public: static property System::Drawing::Color GradientActiveCaption { System::Drawing::Color get(); };

summary.span: 取得 結構，該結構為現用視窗標題列的色彩漸層中最亮的色彩。

span.span: Gets a structure that is the lightest color in the color gradient of an active window's title bar.

value.span: ，為現用視窗標題列的色彩漸層中最亮的色彩。

span.span: A that is the lightest color in the color gradient of an active window's title bar.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property GradientInactiveCaption As Color
public: static property System::Drawing::Color GradientInactiveCaption { System::Drawing::Color get(); };

summary.span: 取得 結構，該結構為非現用視窗標題列的色彩漸層中最亮的色彩。

span.span: Gets a structure that is the lightest color in the color gradient of an inactive window's title bar.

value.span: ，為非現用視窗標題列的色彩漸層中最亮的色彩。

span.span: A that is the lightest color in the color gradient of an inactive window's title bar.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property GrayText As Color
public: static property System::Drawing::Color GrayText { System::Drawing::Color get(); };

summary.span: 取得 結構，這個結構為暗灰色 (Dimmed) 文字的色彩。

span.span: Gets a structure that is the color of dimmed text.
A that is the color of dimmed text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 清單中停用的項目會以暗灰色的文字來顯示。Items in a list that are disabled are displayed in dimmed text.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Highlight As Color
public: static property System::Drawing::Color Highlight { System::Drawing::Color get(); };

summary.span: 取得 結構，這個結構為選取項目的背景色彩。

span.span: Gets a structure that is the color of the background of selected items.
A that is the color of the background of selected items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 選取的項目可能包含功能表項目，以及選取的文字。Selected items may include menu items as well as selected text. 比方說，結構可能會使用清單方塊中選取的項目背景的色彩。For example, the structure may be the color used for the background of selected items in a list box.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property HighlightText As Color
public: static property System::Drawing::Color HighlightText { System::Drawing::Color get(); };

summary.span: 取得 結構，也就是所選項目的文字色彩。

span.span: Gets a structure that is the color of the text of selected items.
A that is the color of the text of selected items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，此色彩用於清單方塊中的選取項目的文字。For example, this color is used for the text of selected items in a list box.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property HotTrack As Color
public: static property System::Drawing::Color HotTrack { System::Drawing::Color get(); };

summary.span: 取得 結構，這個結構是用來指定熱點追蹤項目的色彩。

span.span: Gets a structure that is the color used to designate a hot-tracked item.

value.span: ，為用來指定熱點追蹤項目的色彩。

span.span: A that is the color used to designate a hot-tracked item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按一下熱點追蹤的項目會執行該項目。Single-clicking a hot-tracked item executes the item.
